name: Measured Voice
short_description:
Social media management for professional communicators. Distraction-free
environment. Scheduled social media posts. Metrics that matter. Unlimited users.
long_description:
Measured Voice is the tool for professional social media writers. Measured Voice
provides a secure, distraction-free environment for teams to collaborate on
writing great social media messages. Scheduled Facebook and Twitter posts,
workflow and analytics help organizations stay on track and on voice.
